
Required TFLOPs/s by input shape (TPOT)
=======================================


This table summarizes, for each vision output token length and crop grid, the compute throughput (TFLOPs/s) required to satisfy the configured time-per-output-token (TPOT) requirement for the decode stage, using the analytic flash-attention path.
